<h2 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b>The Role<\u002Fb><\u002Fh2> \n <div>\n  <p>Shell's story in China dates back more than 100 years. At Shell China we will make sure that your ideas will travel. All of Shell’s core businesses are now represented in China. We need world-class candidates to continue our drive to innovate and answer the world’s energy needs in socially and environmentally responsible ways.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p> If you want to play a role in China’s energy transition, then this might be the perfect opportunity for you!<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> Where <\u002Fb><b>y<\u002Fb><b>ou <\u002Fb><b>f<\u002Fb><b>it <\u002Fb><b>i<\u002Fb><b>n<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p> Establishing business relations with the government and NOCs – as partners, legislators, regulators, licensers and competitors – is critical for our business in China.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p> To support the fast growing businesses in China, the Stakeholder Relations Manager will need to build relations with key stakeholders from different levels and regions, taking a connected yet distinct approach to covering Central (NDRC,MOFCOM, MLR , SASAC and etc.) and local relationships ( governors, Mayors, local DRC and other important government agencies) , and both senior level officials (up to vice premier, minister level) and working level staff to gain all-around multilevel support; institutionalize ownership of government relations, develop deep understanding of Chinese decision process and decision makers and tailor engagement and communications accordingly.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p> As individual businesses share the same contacts in government and NOCs, a carefully planned and resourced relationship management process is in place to ensure that contact is seamless and representing all businesses.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> What is the role?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p> You will support the Shell China downstream\u002FProject and Technologies (PT) \u002F part of Renewable Energy Solutions (RES) businesses, the downstream, PT and RES business leaders in the area of stakeholder management with government and NOCs relevant to China Downstream and PT business as well as business development .<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p> Be responsible for helping senior China downstream\u002FRES\u002F PT management better understand the Chinese government + SOE systems and dynamics, identifying key governmental stakeholders, building and nurturing relations with external stakeholders To support engagements and negotiations with key government authorities including NDRC, MOFCOM and provincial\u002F city authorities.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p> Roles and Responsibilities :<\u002Fp>\n  <p> You will support DS\u002FP&amp;T\u002F part of RES to identify key governmental stakeholders, and build relations; Issues management by leveraging sound relationship with government stakeholders and business partners; Support senior engagement and negotiation with central government authorities.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p> You will thrive in:<\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li><p> Developing coherent and consistent strategy that meets the diverse business needs for all Shell’s core Downstream &amp; P&amp;T businesses.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Maximizing value to the businesses in China.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Developing and enlarging network of Shell contacts in Government\u002FSOE organisations in support of business development.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Managing respective governmental relationships in multiple places\u002Fhierachy where there are Shell’s respective business presence.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> What we need from you<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li><p> High level of integrity and maturity, able to represent Shell to senior external stakeholders.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Independent operator with strong commitment and loyalty to the company.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Strong business acumen, pragmatic<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Good team player<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Business savvy with the ability to think creatively and identify business opportunities.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Strong communication, networking and influencing abilities and skills.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Strong negotiation skills.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Excellent written and verbal communications skills in both English and Chinese.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Excellent interpersonal skills, comfortable and efficient in a complex organization.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Excellent understanding of key government\u002FSOEs and their officials with excellent relationships<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Sound understanding of the overall China business environment.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Sound understanding of China’s government structure and decision making systems\u002Fprocesses.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> years working experiences in government affairs with government, SOEs and MNCs<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p> Experience:<\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li><p> Master degree\u002Fpostgraduate education<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Familiarity with the oil &amp; gas business with at least 2-years experiences in one of Shell’s main businesses<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Prior Central government and multinational energy company working experience.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> More about Shell<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n imagination to a business with the ambition to shape the future – whether by investing in oil, gas and renewable energy to meet demand, exploring new ways to store energy, or developing technology that helps the world to use energy more efficiently, everyone at Shell does their part.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> An inclusive place to work <\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p>To power progress, we need to attract and develop the brightest minds and make sure every voice is heard. <h2 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b>The Role<\u002Fb><\u002Fh2> \n <div>\n  <p>Are you willing to shape Shell’s energy transition by accelerating our customer’s journey to e-mobility? Do you want to co-create the ‘Amazon of business mobility’? Are you a leader that is looking for personal development in a rapidly transforming environment? Would you like to be part of a business that continues to grow year on year, with significant contribution to Shell’s bottom line?<\u002Fp>\n  <p><br> Read on to find out more!<\u002Fp>\n  <p><b><br> Where you fit in<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p> Fleet Solutions is the largest B2B direct customer base in Downstream in 47 markets. Moreover:<\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li><p> One of the largest payment platforms in the world<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> A suite of business mobility offers from secure energy payment, over mobility services (e.g. VAT reclaim, toll clearing or parking) to vehicle solutions (e.g. maintenance, leasing) for passenger car and light duty transport vehicles (less than 16 tonnes)<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> A passion for helping customers in their mobility needs and challenging them to find fit-for-purpose solutions together<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Roles that provide unmatched personal growth opportunities<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> A fantastic, positive, team environment with the passion to deliver this growth challenge<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p> If you are keen on accelerating the energy transition for our Fleet customers and you want to build something special with us… we want to hear from you!<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> What’s the role? <\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p>You will be responsible for Shell Fleet Solutions’ National Key Accounts in China. Collaborating with some of the largest companies in China and lead\u002Fsupport WOFE\u002FJVs to deliver business growth, you will be at the forefront of the Energy Transition – in a rapidly evolving business.<\u002Fp>\n  <p> You will:<\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li><p> Ensure full adherence to Ethics &amp; compliance and HSSE Shell standards.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Strong leadership to influence or lead a sales team to deliver performance, with strong selling skills as well as strategic thinking and coaching capability.<\u002Fp>\n    <ul>\n     <li><p> Develop and execute sales plans and key account plans to deliver year on year financial growth for all accounts in China with JV\u002FWOFE\u002FBlue sea<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n     <li><p> Be the expert of FS Business, Can provide the consulting to JV\u002FWOFES to support the business healthy and steady growth<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n     <li><p> Develop and maintain long term commercial relationships with key accounts, and external stakeholders.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n     <li><p> Manage the potential channel conflict. Can provide the standard of the channel management.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n     <li><p> Be a Role model in Sales 1st behaviours\u002Fmethodology.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n    <\u002Ful><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Ensure highest standard of service to our customers.<\u002Fp>\n    <ul>\n     <li><p> Leverage all WOFE\u002FJV Retails sites and service, collaborate with Mkt\u002FDigital\u002FPrice\u002FSupply etc, and interface with Customer Operations, New Energies and e2e partner functions (e.g. Credit), to deliver the best to our customers.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n     <li><p> Lead your customers through the energy transition and their de-carbonization agenda.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n    <\u002Ful><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Develop by industry and business model's customer win and service delivery strategy\u002Fmethodology\u002Fguidelines and train frontline up<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Great communication and collaboration with JV\u002FWOFEs, and well engagement with internal stakeholders, Deliver FS Strategy and Sales First in JV\u002FWOFEs, Ensure the FS business grow year on year, the organization capability to be the full competitiveness team in the market.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> What we need from you<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p> FS National Account Managers will truly ‘sell Shell’, and need the following capabilities:<\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li><p> Maximise performance: deliver significant portfolio growth through deal negotiation, economic acumen and account management<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Strong knowledge of current CVP’s, supply chain and E2E value understanding<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Learner mindset: eagerness to analyse the market or industry to develop and sell new propositions, working collaboratively with customers and stakeholders to deliver optimal solutions<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Engage and Inspire: Ability to mobilise the wider Shell organization to deliver customer CVP’s. Internal network and profile therefore also very important.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Grow Trust in Shell: a trusted advisor who can engage at senior levels.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p> In terms of skills, we are looking for candidates who demonstrate the following attributes:<\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li><p> Entrepreneurial “self-starter” mindset<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Passion for sales, customers and closing deals<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Experience in prospecting\u002Fcold-call sales, value selling, negotiation of high value contracts<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Demonstrated ability to grow sales and profitability<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Customer obsession to understand and anticipate your customer needs and find solutions<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> The experience of indirect channel management and B2B direct sales are both highly preferred<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Ability to manage channel conflict<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Solid analytical skills and finance knowledge<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Knowledge and experience in mobility, or payment or e-mobility would be an advantage<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Excellent communication especially PPT skills<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> English is necessary<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> Company description<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p> Shell's story in China dates back more than 100 years. At Shell China we will make sure that your ideas will travel. All of Shell’s core businesses are now represented in China. We need world-class candidates to continue our drive to innovate and answer the world’s energy needs in socially and environmentally responsible ways.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> An innovative place to work <\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p>There’s never been a more exciting time to work at Shell.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p> Join us and you’ll be adding your talent and imagination to a business with the ambition to shape the future – whether by investing in oil, gas and renewable energy to meet demand, exploring new ways to store energy, or developing technology that helps the world to use energy more efficiently, everyone at Shell does their part.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> An inclusive place to work <\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p>To power progress, we need to attract and develop the brightest minds and make sure every voice is heard. Here are just some of the ways we are nurturing an inclusive environment – one where you can express your ideas, extend your skills, and reach your potential.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li><p> We’re creating a space where people with disabilities can excel through transparent recruitment process, workplace adjustments and ongoing support in their roles. Feel free to let us know about your circumstances when you apply, and we’ll take it from there.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> We’re closing the gender gap – whether that’s through action on equal pay or by enabling more women to reach senior roles in engineering and technology.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> We’re striving to be a pioneer of an inclusive and diverse workplace, promoting equality for employees regardless of sexual orientation or gender identity.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> We consider ourselves a flexible employer and want to support you finding the right balance. We encourage you to discuss this with us in your application.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> A rewarding place to work <\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p>Combine our creative, collaborative environment and global operations with an impressive range of benefits and joining Shell becomes an inspired career choice.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p> We’re huge advocates for career development. We’ll encourage you to try new roles and experience new settings. By pushing people to reach their potential, we frequently help them find skills they never knew they had, or make career moves they never thought possible.<\u002Fp>\n  <br> \n <\u002Fdiv>\n <p><\u002Fp> \n <div>\n  <h3 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><p>Disclaimer <\u002Fp><\u002Fh3>\n  <div>\n   <div>\n    Please note: We occasionally amend or withdraw Shell jobs and reserve the right to do so at any time, including prior to the advertised closing date. Before applying, you are advised to read our data protection policy. This policy describes the processing that may be associated with your personal data and informs you that your personal data may be transferred to Shell\u002FShell Group companies around the world. The Shell Group and its approved recruitment consultants will never ask you for a fee to process or consider your application for a career with Shell. <h2 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b>The Role<\u002Fb><\u002Fh2> \n <div>\n  <p><b>Where you fit in<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p> You will drive the realization of Shell China business growth aspirations focusing on Downstream and New Energy themes by originating, developing, and executing inorganic growth opportunities via new market entry, new business model, portfolio upgrade and restructuring etc. The China team is tasked to drive flawless strategy execution and capture integrated value acting as integrator across CoBs globally and locally and ensuring Shell engagement with external partners with ‘one face’.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p> This is an excellent role for individuals seeking opportunities to deliver inorganic growth with a high level of accountability and autonomy. The incumbent will make a measurable contribution to Downstream and New Energies strategy through application of relationship-building, influencing, stakeholder management, project management and negotiation skills. The NBD A&amp;D space is a dynamic environment, where key success factors include personal pro-activity and resilience, strategic thinking, the ability to adapt and learn quickly, to seize and take opportunities, and to retain a creative, and “can do” mindset in the face of challenges and adversity. The successful candidate will be responsible for representing Shell and furthering Shell’s interests with a wide range of third parties and the ability to act with integrity and deliver results in this environment will be critical.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> What’s the role? <\u002Fb><br> The NBD Manager’s main responsibilities are to support the NBD General Manager and the team to identify, assess, select, define, and execute new inorganic growth opportunities, which include but not limit to the following:<\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li><p> Develop proactive approach to opportunity origination (OI), including markets study, preliminary due diligence and assessment of deal value and risks.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Prioritize new opportunities and potential targets that fit business and country strategy.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Support Business Opportunity Manager (BOM) in various phases of deal according to ORS.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Ensure due diligence robustness for effective value\u002Frisk management, develop detailed business cases, prepare approval documentations, while ensuring strategic alignment and optimal use of scarce resources (capital and people).<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Support negotiations on contractual terms to deliver optimal value.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Manage implementation \u002F integration phase for proper hand-over to business.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Support the management of relationship with external stakeholders (partners, industrial associations, government, etc.) for successful deal origination and delivery.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Ensure interfaces with line of businesses and functions (i.e. Strategy, Finance, Legal, HR, etc.) are engaged appropriately during various project phases for end-to-end value delivery and robust risk management.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Coordinate ad hoc team matters, including various project tracking, internal reports, plan external meetings and conferences, organize team learnings, etc.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> What we need from you<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p> To succeed in this role, you will have the following:<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><i> Basics<\u002Fi><\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li><p> Authentic and compliance to the General Business Principles<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Proficient oral and written English and outstanding skill in business reporting are required.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Commercial sense and business acumen are essential.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Candidate with passion, strategic thinking, problem-solving, team spirit, responsiveness, self-driven are preferred.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><i> Business Development Skills<\u002Fi><\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li><p> Good understanding of digital transformation and way of thinking<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Good understanding of business end to end process and procedures<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Good acumen for value creation and opportunity identification<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Good skill in internal and external relationship management and (senior) internal stakeholder engagement<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Basic understanding of M&amp;A process and entry level negotiation skill<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><i> Communication skills<\u002Fi><\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li><p> Proactive style, collaborative, proactive listening, and skillful convincing.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Learner mindset<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Sense of ownership during identifying difficulties, managing conflicts, providing best possible solutions, and aligning steers of multi-stakeholders<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><i> Health, Safety &amp; Environment compliance<\u002Fi><\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li><p> HSSE Awareness and role model with Respect, Intervene and Care.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> Company description<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p> Shell's story in China dates back more than 100 years. At Shell China we will make sure that your ideas will travel. All of Shell’s core businesses are now represented in China. We need world-class candidates to continue our drive to innovate and answer the world’s energy needs in socially and environmentally responsible ways.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> An innovative place to work <\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p>There’s never been a more exciting time to work at Shell.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p> Join us and you’ll be adding your talent and imagination to a business with the ambition to shape the future – whether by investing in oil, gas and renewable energy to meet demand, exploring new ways to store energy, or developing technology that helps the world to use energy more efficiently, everyone at Shell does their part.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> An inclusive place to work <\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p>To power progress, we need to attract and develop the brightest minds and make sure every voice is heard. Here are just some of the ways we are nurturing an inclusive environment – one where you can express your ideas, extend your skills, and reach your potential.<\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li><p> We’re creating a space where people with disabilities can excel through transparent recruitment process, workplace adjustments and ongoing support in their roles. Feel free to let us know about your circumstances when you apply, and we’ll take it from there.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> We’re closing the gender gap – whether that’s through action on equal pay or by enabling more women to reach senior roles in engineering and technology.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> We’re striving to be a pioneer of an inclusive and diverse workplace, promoting equality for employees regardless of sexual orientation or gender identity.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> We consider ourselves a flexible employer and want to support you finding the right balance. We encourage you to discuss this with us in your application.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> A rewarding place to work <\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p>Combine our creative, collaborative environment and global operations with an impressive range of benefits and joining Shell becomes an inspired career choice.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p> We’re huge advocates for career development. We’ll encourage you to try new roles and experience new settings. By pushing people to reach their potential, we frequently help them find skills they never knew they had, or make career moves they never thought possible.<\u002Fp>\n  <br> \n  <p><\u002Fp> \n <\u002Fdiv>\n <p><\u002Fp> \n <div>\n  <h3 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><p>Disclaimer <\u002Fp><\u002Fh3>\n  <div>\n   <div>\n    Please note: We occasionally amend or withdraw Shell jobs and reserve the right to do so at any time, including prior to the advertised closing date. Anyone who demands such a fee is not an authorised Shell representative and you are strongly advised to refuse any such demand. <h2 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b>The Role<\u002Fb><\u002Fh2> \n <div>\n  <p>Shell's story in China dates back more than 100 years. At Shell China we will make sure that your ideas will travel. All of Shell’s core businesses are now represented in China. We need world-class candidates to continue our drive to innovate and answer the world’s energy needs in socially and environmentally responsible ways.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> What's the role?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p> You will work closely with academic partners, start-ups and commercial and industrial customers to test, pilot and demonstrate innovative technology concepts in the areas of stationary energy storage or electric mobility with the aim to scale and commercialize as soon as reasonably possible. More specifically, in this role you will:<\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li><p> Support identification of promising storage technologies and development of these through the Shell Deliver Technology Process; discovering\u002Fevaluating, developing\u002Fpiloting, demonstrating and deploying towards commercial scale.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Establish working knowledge of techno-economic analysis to place technology developments in appropriate context.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Deliver lab &amp; pilot projects, often in multi-party collaborations.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Maintain competitive landscape information, including cost and performance characteristics of commercially available storage technologies.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Define key energy storage product characteristics and performance criteria for technology deployment areas, including electrification of industrial processes and electric mobility in multiples sectors.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Maintain a strong focus on product and process safety towards development and deployment of new storage technologies.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Represent Shell in relevant academic and industry platforms and present at conferences.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Contribute to results published in internal technical reports, conference presentations, and patent filings.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Develop understanding of the broader energy system, the energy transition, and the role of emerging storage technologies in Shell’s electrification ambitions.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> What we need from you<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li><p> Demonstrated commitment to safety, health, and environmental considerations<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Understanding of energy storage technology from an electrochemistry\u002Fmaterials science perspective and\u002For from a system design\u002Fintegration perspective<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Experience with energy storage technologies and the role of energy storage in electrification<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Experience in product design and prototyping,<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Consumer thinking, translating end user product requirements into relevant, robust, critical-to-quality process parameters<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Systems thinking, translating market needs into technical requirements<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Physical and computational prototyping and product design<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Experience in demonstration and deployment of new technologies<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Effective relationship management with technical and non-technical collaborators (internal &amp;\u002For external)<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Working knowledge of IP considerations<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Project leadership and laboratory supervisory experience<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Demonstrated commitment to R&amp;D as evidenced through technical presentations and publications<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li>\n    <ul>\n     <li>MS\u002FPhD in electrical or mechanical engineering or related disciplines<\u002Fli>\n    <\u002Ful><\u002Fli>\n   <li>\n    <ul>\n     <li>You are keen to keep learning and persistent towards your end goal.<\u002Fli>\n    <\u002Ful><\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> More about Shell<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> An innovative place to work <\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p>There’s never been a more exciting time to work at Shell.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p> Join us and you’ll be adding your talent and imagination to a business with the ambition to shape the future – whether by investing in oil, gas and renewable energy to meet demand, exploring new ways to store energy, or developing technology that helps the world to use energy more efficiently, everyone at Shell does their part.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> An inclusive place to work <\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p>To power progress, we need to attract and develop the brightest minds and make sure every voice is heard. Here are just some of the ways we are nurturing an inclusive environment – one where you can express your ideas, extend your skills, and reach your potential.<\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li><p> We’re creating a space where people with disabilities can excel through transparent recruitment process, workplace adjustments and ongoing support in their roles. Feel free to let us know about your circumstances when you apply, and we’ll take it from there.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> We’re closing the gender gap – whether that’s through action on equal pay or by enabling more women to reach senior roles in engineering and technology.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> We’re striving to be a pioneer of an inclusive and diverse workplace, promoting equality for employees regardless of sexual orientation or gender identity.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> We consider ourselves a flexible employer and want to support you finding the right balance. We encourage you to discuss this with us in your application.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p> Energy transition is one of the most complex challenges to ever face humankind. Research has shown that the differences in who we are, what we’ve experienced, and how we think are crucial to deliver top performance. Diversity in all aspects is core to our ways of working including our hiring practices and we are committed to build a team and environment that accelerates the path towards a net zero society.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> A rewarding place to work <\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p>Combine our creative, collaborative environment and global operations with an impressive range of benefits and joining Shell becomes an inspired career choice.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p> We’re huge advocates for career development. We’ll encourage you to try new roles and experience new settings. By pushing people to reach their potential, we frequently help them find skills they never knew they had, or make career moves they never thought possible.<\u002Fp>\n  <br> \n <\u002Fdiv>\n <p><\u002Fp> \n <div>\n  <h3 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><p>Disclaimer <\u002Fp><\u002Fh3>\n  <div>\n   <div>\n    Please note: We occasionally amend or withdraw Shell jobs and reserve the right to do so at any time, including prior to the advertised closing date. <h2 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b>The Role<\u002Fb><\u002Fh2> \n <div>\n  <p><b>Job Description Details<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p> As part of the consultancy team, contributing to the growth of the business, you will be involved in delivering client services. Services will include carbon, sustainability, and energy services and carbon offset products. You will also get involved in account management &amp; selling these services and products to existent clients.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> Where you fit in <\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p>As our product and service are enabling clients to speed up the Net-Zero Carbon Emission Journey, we help clients to understand the current situation, develop de carbon strategy and figure out the cost-effective de carbon solutions. You are going to be a key part of the strategy consulting, a team of professionals who are passionate about helping Shell to develop a new value Chain in China.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> What’s the role? <\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li><b>Delivering business <\u002Fb>- delivering and\u002For managing the delivery of a range of carbon, energy and sustainability management services either directly to the client or as part of a team.<\u002Fli>\n   <li><b> Product development <\u002Fb>- supporting new service development &amp; roll-out to clients in response to their needs.<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p> Specific products \u002F Services for the role include but not limit to:<\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li> Critical equipment energy efficiency improvement such as Air compressor, Boiler, Pump, ect<\u002Fli>\n   <li> Process Optimization to eliminate the waste and shorten the production cycle time<\u002Fli>\n   <li> Integrate outside resource and advanced technology to be a cost-effective solution to customers<\u002Fli>\n   <li> Leverage financial tools to design multi business models fitting for different customers’ need<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> What we need from you? <\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p>You may have some carbon\u002Fenergy experience, but alternatively you may have experience of energy or waste audits or behavioral change.<\u002Fp>\n  <p> Personal Qualities<\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li> Learner Mindset<\u002Fli>\n   <li> Self Starter<\u002Fli>\n   <li> Creative - readily able to identify opportunities for clients and our business<\u002Fli>\n   <li> Tenacious Team player<\u002Fli>\n   <li> Good verbal and written communications skills<\u002Fli>\n   <li> Numerate<\u002Fli>\n   <li> Experienced in CI and Agile WoW<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p> You have a Bachelor or Master’s degree in environmental science or Physical science (Physics, Chemistry), Engineering or Maths-based subject<\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li> A good understanding around the subject climate change and the link to greenhouse gas emissions<\u002Fli>\n   <li> Good customer facing skills<\u002Fli>\n   <li> Familiar the standard addressed in ISO14064 and PAS2060<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <ul>\n   <li> Strong problem-solving, organization and project management skills.<\u002Fli>\n   <li> Capable of understanding project-level content as well as executive-level strategic thinking<\u002Fli>\n   <li> Candidates with a business background who have a deep understanding of customers, digital opportunities, the company's value proposition for its products, and the technology context and strategy required to differentiate those products in the marketplace<\u002Fli>\n   <li> Ability to influence behavior without organizational hierarchy.<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful> \n <\u002Fdiv>\n <p><\u002Fp> \n <div>\n  <h3 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><p>Disclaimer <\u002Fp><\u002Fh3>\n  <div>\n   <div>\n    Please note: We occasionally amend or withdraw Shell jobs and reserve the right to do so at any time, including prior to the advertised closing date. <h2 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b>The Role<\u002Fb><\u002Fh2> \n <div>\n  <p><b>What is the role?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p> You will lead multiple research projects and activities in energy storage related research and development programmes, as well as developing broader topical, project, and market expertise related to various forms of energy storage. More specifically, in this role you will:<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li><p> Be a technology domain and\u002For project lead with natural teams of 3-8 members across Shell to develop large scale energy storage for use in multiple sectors.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Identify promising storage technologies and develop these through the Shell Deliver Technology Process from D0 through D4; discovering\u002Fevaluating, developing\u002Fpiloting, demonstrating and deploying towards commercial scale.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Establish working knowledge of techno-economic analysis to place technology developments in appropriate context<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Develop and expand laboratory capabilities and experimental procedures; identify\u002Fdevelop\u002Fimplement tools for data acquisition and analysis<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Maintain strong focus on product and process safety towards development and deployment of new storage technologies.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Develop understanding of the broader energy system, the energy transition, &amp; the role of emerging technologies; evaluate external technologies for technical and economic viability and potential, and place technology developments into appropriate contexts<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Be responsible for technical reports and patent filings and contribute to results published in peer-reviewed publications, internal technical reports, conference presentations, and patent filings<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li>\n    <ul>\n     <li>Represent Shell in relevant academic and industry platforms and present at conferences.<\u002Fli>\n    <\u002Ful><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Be a trusted advisor for a.o. Shell sector teams, Shell Ventures and Shell Trading to help screen investment opportunities and recommend how they may or may not fit within the energy storage technology roadmap.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b><i> What we need from you<\u002Fi><\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li><p> Demonstrated commitment to safety, health, and environmental considerations<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Strong stakeholder management (technical &amp; non-technical, Shell &amp; external)<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Experience with energy storage technologies and the role of energy storage in electrification<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Understanding of energy storage technology from an electrochemistry\u002Fmaterials science perspective and from a system design\u002Fintegration perspective<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Direct experience with laboratory setup and experimental techniques relevant to electrochemical energy systems; experience with extending or developing novel techniques is beneficial<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Design, synthesis, functionalization, &amp; characterization of electrically active materials; material structure-property relationships; device fabrication &amp; characterization; influence of manufacturing on performance<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Demonstrated commitment to R&amp;D as evidenced through technical presentations and publications<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Working knowledge of intellectual property (IP) considerations<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Experience translating customer &amp; market needs into technical requirements<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Consumer + systems thinking<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Translating end user product requirements into relevant, robust, critical-to-quality process parameters<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Product design and prototyping (physical and computational)<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Project leadership and laboratory supervisory experience<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> PhD in materials science, chemical engineering, chemistry, physics, or related field. Experience with electrochemical engineering and electrochemically active materials is a plus<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> You are keen to keep learning and persistent towards your end goal<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b><i> Diversity<\u002Fi><\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p> Energy transition is one of the most complex challenges to ever face humankind. Research has shown that the differences in who we are, what we have experienced, and how we think are crucial to deliver top performance. Diversity in all aspects is core to our ways of working including our hiring practices and we are committed to build a team and environment that accelerates the path towards a net zero society.<\u002Fp>\n  <br> \n <\u002Fdiv>\n <p><\u002Fp> \n <div>\n  <h3 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><p>Disclaimer <\u002Fp><\u002Fh3>\n  <div>\n   <div>\n    Please note: We occasionally amend or withdraw Shell jobs and reserve the right to do so at any time, including prior to the advertised closing date. Anyone who demands such a fee is not an authorised Shell representative and you are strongly advised to refuse any such demand. <h2 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b>The Role<\u002Fb><\u002Fh2> \n <div>\n  <p>Shell's story in China dates back more than 100 years. At Shell China we will make sure that your ideas will travel. All of Shell’s core businesses are now represented in China. We need world-class candidates to continue our drive to innovate and answer the world’s energy needs in socially and environmentally responsible ways.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> What's the role?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p> You will maintain and develop relationship with responsible distributors and sell through them to grow Shell lubricants CRTO business in responsible cities by increasing volume and margin in line with business plan. Additionally to maintain a robust distributor network as a solid platform for business growth.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p> Accountabilities:<\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li><p> To deliver team and individual KPIs as set by the Sales Manager<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> To develop and manage a Distributors network to deliver Shell CVPs to final users in an efficient, cost effective, sustainable way.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> To ensure that all Distributors are aligned to Shell channel strategy and deliver a mutually agreed sales business plan. Leverage Shell DVP to increase distributors’ profitability and mind share to Shell.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> To plan distributor\u002Fcustomer calls and visits to provide the appropriate level of service to distributors and customers with a focus on retaining\u002Fexpanding business relationships.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> To increase the value for existing Shell customers through cross, range and up selling.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> To develop new opportunities with prospective customers through distributor network<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> To plan, monitor and achieve individual sales targets e.g. volume, margin, growth, and trade debtor target.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> To develop, update, maintain, and communicate the distributor business plan, and manage distributor performance with Shell provided sales tools<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> To act within Shell MoA, HSSE policy and Business Principles<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> What we need from you<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li><p> Sound commercial experience in sales\u002Fmarketing, channel management.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Strong communications\u002Fengagement skills.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Digital mindset and capabilities will be preferred.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Strong customer focus, significant sales experience with proven success in developing profitable business, proven experience in innovation.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> More about Shell<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> An innovative place to work <\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p>There’s never been a more exciting time to work at Shell.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p> Join us and you’ll be adding your talent and imagination to a business with the ambition to shape the future – whether by investing in oil, gas and renewable energy to meet demand, exploring new ways to store energy, or developing technology that helps the world to use energy more efficiently, everyone at Shell does their part.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> An inclusive place to work <\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p>To power progress, we need to attract and develop the brightest minds and make sure every voice is heard. Here are just some of the ways we are nurturing an inclusive environment – one where you can express your ideas, extend your skills, and reach your potential.<\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li><p> We’re creating a space where people with disabilities can excel through transparent recruitment process, workplace adjustments and ongoing support in their roles. Feel free to let us know about your circumstances when you apply, and we’ll take it from there.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> We’re closing the gender gap – whether that’s through action on equal pay or by enabling more women to reach senior roles in engineering and technology.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> We’re striving to be a pioneer of an inclusive and diverse workplace, promoting equality for employees regardless of sexual orientation or gender identity.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> We consider ourselves a flexible employer and want to support you finding the right balance. We encourage you to discuss this with us in your application.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> A rewarding place to work <\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p>Combine our creative, collaborative environment and global operations with an impressive range of benefits and joining Shell becomes an inspired career choice.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p> We’re huge advocates for career development. We’ll encourage you to try new roles and experience new settings. By pushing people to reach their potential, we frequently help them find skills they never knew they had, or make career moves they never thought possible.<\u002Fp>\n  <br> \n  <p><\u002Fp> \n <\u002Fdiv>\n <p><\u002Fp> \n <div>\n  <h3 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><p>Disclaimer <\u002Fp><\u002Fh3>\n  <div>\n   <div>\n    Please note: We occasionally amend or withdraw Shell jobs and reserve the right to do so at any time, including prior to the advertised closing date. Before applying, you are advised to read our data protection policy. Anyone who demands such a fee is not an authorised Shell representative and you are strongly advised to refuse any such demand. <h2 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b>The Role<\u002Fb><\u002Fh2> \n <div>\n  <p>As part of our consultancy team, contributing to the growth of the business, you will be involved in delivering client services. Services will include carbon, sustainability, and energy services and carbon offset products. You will also get involved in account management &amp; selling these services and products to existent clients.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p> As Agile manager, he\u002Fshe will lead and coach plant to use Agile\u002FCI methodology to improve efficiency and effectiveness of E2E operation. It offers an opportunity to work with multiple stakeholders carving out new ways of working and set the organization towards Continuous Improvement culture and Agile culture<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> Where you fit in <\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p>As our product and service are enabling clients to speed up the Net-Zero Carbon Emission Journey, we help clients to understand the current situation, develop de carbon strategy and figure out the cost-effective de carbon solutions. You are going to be a key part of the strategy consulting, a team of professionals who are passionate about helping Shell to develop a new value Chain in China.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p> Agile\u002FCI becomes an ever-important part of plant operations to simplify and optimize our processes for improved efficiency and effectiveness.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> What’s the role? <\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li><b>Delivering business <\u002Fb>- delivering and\u002For managing the delivery of a range of carbon, energy and sustainability management services either directly to the client or as part of a team.<\u002Fli>\n   <li><b> Account Management <\u002Fb>– developing productive relationships with clients leading to repeat and new project work with them.<\u002Fli>\n   <li><b> Winning business<\u002Fb>– working alone and as a part of a team to identify prospects, submitting proposals for assignments to clients and closing sales. You will also be responsible for identifying new opportunities for cross-selling of services to your clients.<\u002Fli>\n   <li><b> Product development <\u002Fb>- supporting new service development &amp; roll-out to clients in response to their needs.<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p> Specific products \u002F Services for the role include but not limit to:<\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li> Critical equipment energy efficiency improvement such as Air compressor, Boiler, Pump, etc.<\u002Fli>\n   <li> Process Optimization to eliminate the waste and shorten the production cycle time<\u002Fli>\n   <li> Integrate outside resource and advanced technology to be a cost-effective solution to customers<\u002Fli>\n   <li> Leverage financial tools to design multi business models fitting for different customers’ need<\u002Fli>\n   <li><b> Agile\u002FCI capability<\u002Fb>: Work with business leads to develop a clear improvement plan on CI\u002FAgile each year.\n    <ul>\n     <li> Develop and implement a clear CI\u002FAgile roadmap for the business, encompassing aspects and concrete deliverables of value delivery, capability building and culture that are intimately connected to the business priorities<\u002Fli>\n     <li> Drive growth of continuous improvement, digitalization, and Agile culture in the cluster including roll out of plant’s initiatives<\u002Fli>\n     <li> Build awareness of the CI, Agile and Digitalization methodology in the organization, accountable to infiltrate the organization with continuous improvement and agile thinking<\u002Fli>\n     <li> Leading high value CI, Agile, and Digitalization projects in plant<\u002Fli>\n     <li> Perform external and internal benchmarks where available to identify gaps and opportunity areas to improve competitiveness.<\u002Fli>\n     <li> Coordinate with other function and define effective working process for cross function activities<\u002Fli>\n     <li> Work with business development in Operations Capability<\u002Fli>\n    <\u002Ful><\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> What we need from you? <\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p>You may have some carbon\u002Fenergy experience, but alternatively you may have experience of energy or waste audits or behavioral change.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p> Personal Qualities<\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li> Learner Mindset<\u002Fli>\n   <li> Self-starter<\u002Fli>\n   <li> Creative - readily able to identify opportunities for clients and our business<\u002Fli>\n   <li> Experienced in CI and Agile WoW<\u002Fli>\n science, Physical science(Physics, Chemistry), Engineering of heating &amp; ventilation, or chemical<\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li> A good understanding around the subject climate change and the link to greenhouse gas emissions<\u002Fli>\n   <li> Good customer facing skills<\u002Fli>\n   <li> Familiar the standard addressed in ISO14064 and PAS2060<\u002Fli>\n   <li> Strong problem-solving, organization and project management skills.<\u002Fli>\n   <li> Track-record of leading large, cross-functional teams in delivering results\u002Fdecisions.<\u002Fli>\n   <li> Having minimum of 10 years of experienced required for this role<\u002Fli>\n   <li> Capable of understanding project-level content as well as executive-level strategic thinking<\u002Fli>\n   <li> Candidates with a business <h2 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b>The Role<\u002Fb><\u002Fh2> \n <div>\n  <p>This is an exciting role for individuals seeking opportunities to deliver strategic plan with a high level of accountability and autonomy. The incumbent will make a measurable contribution through application of strategic planning, relationship-building, influencing, stakeholder management, project management and negotiation skills. The ETP space is a dynamic environment, where key success factors include personal pro-activity and resilience, strategic thinking, the ability to adapt and learn quickly, to seize and take opportunities, and to retain a creative, and “can do” mindset in the face of challenges and adversity. <\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b>Where you fit in<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p> The Energy Transition Program (ETP) is a function aiming of developing and implementing strategy to accelerate the Energy Transition and making Powering Progress live. <\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p>Key deliverables is to track &amp; analysis the market signpost ensuring our strategy is in step with the society, to help shaping effective policy outcomes and achieve attractive transitions to a low carbon energy system , also to help Shell address the business risks and opportunities that will likely arise. <\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p>The ETP is part of the transformation leading to our long-term success that hinges on our ability to play a competitive and constructive role in the ongoing global energy system transition.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> What's the role?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p> Working closely with other functions, the ETP manager will drive the realization of Shell China transition aspirations by turning insights into business implication, identifying and developing integrated opportunities via new product\u002Fservice offering, new business model, &amp; portfolio upgrade.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p> This role will establish relationships with key internal and external stakeholders to facilitate strategy discussions and new business activities.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p> More specifically:<\u002Fp>\n  <div>\n   <ul>\n    <li><p> Support Country Transition Manager to develop &amp; Implement the Country Transition Plan for Shell in China, working closely with the ETP community, business, supporting function and external stakeholders in and outside China.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n    <li><p> Support the two cadences – CPU (Customer performance Unit) and Hub Cadence in driving the integrated opportunities across business and function.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n    <li><p> Provide fit for purpose quality market insight, analysis and presentations to China CCT &amp; ETP community on the China energy market.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n    <li><p> Lead\u002Fsupport studies and related analysis to identify, validate and quantify opportunities to facilitate new opportunities discussions with various businesses. <\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n    <li><p>Support CTM in ETP project management, documentation and DRB reporting.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n    <li><p> Lead interface and coordination with external organisers and partners at relevant in-country energy industry events, conferences and forums; develop Shell engagement materials and process internal clearance for external use.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <\u002Ful>\n   <p><\u002Fp>\n   <p> This role provides an unique opportunity to help shape the longer-term growth strategy for Shell in the largest energy market of the world, an accelerated learning curve through exposure to multiple businesses and functions both in China as well as globally, and an exciting development platform for aspiring leaders of the future.<\u002Fp>\n  <\u002Fdiv>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> What we need from you<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li><p> Proficient oral and written English and outstanding skill in strategy reporting are required. <\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p>Commercial sense and business acumen are essential.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Candidate with passion, strategic thinking, problem-solving, team spirit, responsiveness, self-driven are preferred. <\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p>Strategic planning &amp; implementation Skills<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Strong analytical capability, able to connect dots and develop a holistic view<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Strong ability in turning insight to meaningful business implication<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Deliver innovative solutions<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Prior experience in Commercial &amp; Strategy development is preferred<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Good understanding of business end to end process and procedures<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Good acumen for opportunity identification<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Good skill in internal and external relationship management and (senior) internal stakeholder engagement<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Proactive style, collaborative, proactive listening, and skillful convincing. <\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p>Sense of ownership during identifying difficulties, managing conflicts, providing best possible solutions, and aligning steers of multi-stakeholders<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Health, Safety &amp; Environment compliance - HSSE Awareness and role model<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> More about Shell<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> An innovative place to work <\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p>There’s never been a more exciting time to work at Shell.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p> Join us and you’ll be adding your talent and imagination to a business with the ambition to shape the future – whether by investing in oil, gas and renewable energy to meet demand, exploring new ways to store energy, or developing technology that helps the world to use energy more efficiently, everyone at Shell does their part.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> An inclusive place to work <\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p>To power progress, we need to attract and develop the brightest minds and make sure every voice is heard. Feel free to let us know about your circumstances when you apply, and we’ll take it from there.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> We’re closing the gender gap – whether that’s through action on equal pay or by enabling more women to reach senior roles in engineering and technology.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> We’re striving to be a pioneer of an inclusive and diverse workplace, promoting equality for employees regardless of sexual orientation or gender identity.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> We consider ourselves a flexible employer and want to support you finding the right balance. <h2 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b>The Role<\u002Fb><\u002Fh2> \n <div>\n  <p><b>Where you fit in<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p> Use your understanding of power markets, regulatory frameworks, industrial energy needs, and current &amp; emerging electrical technologies to support the assessment, development &amp; deployment of electrification solutions for the decarbonization of industry.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p> You will bring extensive electrical power experience in China to identify, mature and tailor commercial solutions for domestic industrial markets. Through your experience and networks in the Chinese electrical industry, and associated research communities, you will identify and leverage capabilities to support the development of electrification technologies and supply chains for global industrial applications.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> What's the role?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p> More specifically, you will be entrusted to:<\u002Fp>\n focused small and medium sized companies to identify leading technologies for the development of electrification solutions.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Lead Chinese supplier identification and supply chain set-up in support of domestic and global product delivery.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Maintain a deep knowledge of power markets, regulatory frameworks and industrial energy needs in China.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Lead the development of CVPs and business models for electrification solutions in industrial applications for the Chinese market.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Identify product and solution deployment opportunities in China.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Continued commitment to deliver HSSE excellence for personnel and operations.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> What we need from you<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li><p> A master’s degree or higher from a leading institution in electrical engineering, mechanical engineering, physics, or a related discipline with strong electrical content.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> 10 or more years of industrial experience in providing electrical power solutions.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Excellent communication (written and verbal) and interpersonal skills.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> A passion and commitment to using your knowledge and experience to help the energy transition and decarbonization of society through economically attractive solutions.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Extensive knowledge of renewable power generation technologies and their typical characteristics<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Thorough understanding of Chinese power market and regulatory framework<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Deep experience and in oil, gas and renewable energy to meet demand, exploring new ways to store energy, or developing technology that helps the world to use energy more efficiently, everyone at Shell does their part.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> An inclusive place to work <\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p>To power progress, we need to attract and develop the brightest minds and make sure every voice is heard. <h2 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b>The Role<\u002Fb><\u002Fh2> \n <div>\n  <p>Shell's story in China dates back more than 100 years. At Shell China we will make sure that your ideas will travel. All of Shell’s core businesses are now represented in China. We need world-class candidates to continue our drive to innovate and answer the world’s energy needs in socially and environmentally responsible ways.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <div>\n   <div>\n    <div>\n     <div>\n      <p><b> What's the role?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n      <p> As the ICAM for Gansu, Qinghai, and Xizang, you will maintain and develop relationship with responsible distributors and sell through them to grow Shell lubricants CRTO business in responsible cities by increasing volume and margin in line with business plan. Additionally to maintain a robust distributor network as a solid platform for business growth.<\u002Fp>\n      <p><\u002Fp>\n      <p> Accountabilities:<\u002Fp>\n      <ul>\n       <li><p> To deliver team and individual KPIs as set by the Sales Manager<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n       <li><p> To develop and manage a Distributors network to deliver Shell CVPs to final users in an efficient, cost effective, sustainable way.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n       <li><p> To ensure that all Distributors are aligned to Shell channel strategy and deliver a mutually agreed sales business plan. Leverage Shell DVP to increase distributors’ profitability and mind share to Shell.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n       <li><p> To plan distributor\u002Fcustomer calls and visits to provide the appropriate level of service to distributors and customers with a focus on retaining\u002Fexpanding business relationships.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n       <li><p> To increase the value for existing Shell customers through cross, range and up selling.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n       <li><p> To develop new opportunities with prospective customers through distributor network<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n       <li><p> To plan, monitor and achieve individual sales targets e.g. volume, margin, growth, and trade debtor target.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n       <li><p> To develop, update, maintain, and communicate the distributor business plan, and manage distributor performance with Shell provided sales tools<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n       <li><p> To act within Shell MoA, HSSE policy and Business Principles<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n <h2 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b>The Role<\u002Fb><\u002Fh2> \n <div>\n  <p>Shell's story in China dates back more than 100 years. At Shell China we will make sure that your ideas will travel. All of Shell’s core businesses are now represented in China. We need world-class candidates to continue our drive to innovate and answer the world’s energy needs in socially and environmentally responsible ways.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> What's the role?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p> You will maintain and develop relationship with responsible distributors and sell through them to grow Shell lubricants CRTO business in responsible cities by increasing volume and margin in line with business plan. Additionally to maintain a robust distributor network as a solid platform for business growth.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p> Accountabilities:<\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li><p> To deliver team and individual KPIs as set by the Sales Manager<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> To develop and manage a Distributors network to deliver Shell CVPs to final users in an efficient, cost effective, sustainable way.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> To ensure that all Distributors are aligned to Shell channel strategy and deliver a mutually agreed sales business plan. Leverage Shell DVP to increase distributors’ profitability and mind share to Shell.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> To plan distributor\u002Fcustomer calls and visits to provide the appropriate level of service to distributors and customers with a focus on retaining\u002Fexpanding business relationships.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> To increase the value for existing Shell customers through cross, range and up selling.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> To develop new opportunities with prospective customers through distributor network<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> To plan, monitor and achieve individual sales targets e.g. volume, margin, growth, and trade debtor target.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> To develop, update, maintain, and communicate the distributor business plan, and manage distributor performance with Shell provided sales tools<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> To act within Shell MoA, HSSE policy and Business Principles<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> What we need from you<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li><p> Sound commercial experience in sales\u002Fmarketing, channel management.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Strong communications\u002Fengagement skills.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Digital mindset and capabilities will be preferred.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Strong customer focus, significant sales experience with proven success in developing profitable business, proven experience in innovation.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> More about Shell<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n talent and imagination to a business with the ambition to shape the future – whether by investing in oil, gas and renewable energy to meet demand, exploring new ways to store energy, or developing technology that helps the world to use energy more efficiently, everyone at Shell does their part.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> An inclusive place to work <\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p>To power progress, we need to attract and develop the brightest minds and make sure every voice is heard. Here are just some of the ways we are nurturing an inclusive environment – one where you can express your ideas, extend your skills, and reach your potential.<\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li><p> We’re creating a space where people with disabilities can excel through transparent recruitment process, workplace adjustments and ongoing support in their roles. Feel free to let us know about your circumstances when you apply, and we’ll take it from there.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> We’re closing the gender gap – whether that’s through action on equal pay or by enabling more women to reach senior roles in engineering and technology.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> We’re striving to be a pioneer of an inclusive and diverse workplace, promoting equality for employees regardless of sexual orientation or gender identity.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> We consider ourselves a flexible employer and want to support you finding the right balance. We encourage you to discuss this with us in your application.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> A rewarding place to work <\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p>Combine our creative, collaborative environment and global operations with an impressive range of benefits and joining Shell becomes an inspired career choice.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p> We’re huge advocates for career development. <h2 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b>The Role<\u002Fb><\u002Fh2> \n <div>\n  <p>Shell's story in China dates back more than 100 years. At Shell China we will make sure that your ideas will travel. All of Shell’s core businesses are now represented in China. We need world-class candidates to continue our drive to innovate and answer the world’s energy needs in socially and environmentally responsible ways.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> What's the role?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <p> You will maintain and develop relationship with responsible distributors and sell through them to grow Shell lubricants CRTO business in responsible cities by increasing volume and margin in line with business plan. Additionally to maintain a robust distributor network as a solid platform for business growth.<\u002Fp>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p> Accountabilities:<\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li><p> To deliver team and individual KPIs as set by the Sales Manager<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> To develop and manage a Distributors network to deliver Shell CVPs to final users in an efficient, cost effective, sustainable way.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> To ensure that all Distributors are aligned to Shell channel strategy and deliver a mutually agreed sales business plan. Leverage Shell DVP to increase distributors’ profitability and mind share to Shell.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> To plan distributor\u002Fcustomer calls and visits to provide the appropriate level of service to distributors and customers with a focus on retaining\u002Fexpanding business relationships.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> To increase the value for existing Shell customers through cross, range and up selling.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> To develop new opportunities with prospective customers through distributor network<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> To plan, monitor and achieve individual sales targets e.g. volume, margin, growth, and trade debtor target.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> To develop, update, maintain, and communicate the distributor business plan, and manage distributor performance with Shell provided sales tools<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> To act within Shell MoA, HSSE policy and Business Principles<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> What we need from you<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <ul>\n   <li><p> Sound commercial experience in sales\u002Fmarketing, channel management.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Strong communications\u002Fengagement skills.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Digital mindset and capabilities will be preferred.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n   <li><p> Strong customer focus, significant sales experience with proven success in developing profitable business, proven experience in innovation.<\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <p><b> More about Shell<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n
